QuestData.Title: Eye Spy
QuestData.Description: This terrible thing makes my hair stand on end. Cho'gall uses these to control his minions - now it's time to use it against him.$B$BLet me see... hmm, it's all cloudy. All I can see is you. Why is it showing me you?$B$B<Garona sets the eye out in front of her.>$B$BLook into the eye and tell me what you see. Peer into Cho'gall's lair! What is he doing? Is he heavily guarded? Tell me!
QuestData.LogDescription: Peer into the Eye of Twilight for Garona.
QuestData.CompletionText: What did the Eye show you?
QuestData.RewardText: You've gone pale, $c. What did the Eye show you?$B$BYou saw Cho'gall? Wait - Cho'gall saw you? He's watching us? He's watching us right now!?$B$BDamn this stupid dark magic! I'm going to have to infiltrate Cho'gall's stronghold myself.
